name: One Bot's Trash
description:
You are a robot searching for spare parts in a local junkyard. Use various trinkets to help you on your way.

Created for Global Game Jam 2021

Credits

Trent Fowler - Production

Baylee Redding - Art & Animation

Jarrod Tomasic - Art & Animation

Joshua Standridge - Programming, Level Design

Matthew Stolz - Programming, Implementation

Garrett Switzer - Sound, Programming
